summary: Copy of in-game arrows with a a new texture...Based off the Sithis\' window in the Dark Brotherhood sanctuary...DOES NOT REPLACE ORIGINAL ARROW.....PICTURES IN DESCRIPTION
descriptionHtml:
Copy of in-game arrows with a a new texture...Based off the Sithis\' window in the Dark Brotherhood sanctuary...DOES NOT REPLACE ORIGINAL ARROW.....PICTURES IN DESCRIPTION

Yeah i pretty much covered everything there in the short description
Most arrows are included 
Located in a chest, in the camp just outside Riverwood\'s south road (Will put a picture showing location)
More valuable and do more damage than vanilla version of the arrows

Comments would be appreciated!!!!!!!!!!!!

Like and share!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: GeorgiePorgie98
